text: the joy of soccer for me is that it's a
team sport you can work together towards
a common goal all with your best friends
on that soccer pitch
[Music]
it's not about us it's about teams when
i come to a soccer field you know i walk
into the facility and already you know
you see a smile on my face it's like my
happy place i can come to the pitch and
i can put on my boots and already my
mood has elevated and you can just see
that i've become you know a happier
person and this is the place where i
love to be it allows me to just you know
build that confidence and and bring that
smile to my face that really is the most
important thing a love of what you're
doing and it allows me to just be me
it's really you know desiree scott the
soccer player that's what i know that's
what i do and it allows me to just not
think about anything else i can go and
just do the sport that i love all it
took was hard work i knew i could be
great i just had to take a risk on me
why would i play it safe it's not about
us it's about me
sport is so important for kids growing
up my mom couldn't afford you know the
registration fees all the equipment so
i've done soccer camps every year trying
to raise money right into the community
through those camps just getting
involved hands-on with the kids it's
something i love to do and we don't want
anyone to not be able to play sport
because they can't afford it they can
just go and play and have fun and not
worry about those things that are off
the pitch or off the soccer field
being from winnipeg already so proud but
getting kids to have a goal and to see
what they can be i try and really just
inspire them get involved and just let
them know that i'm a normal human i came
from winnipeg i play on the soccer
fields these kids play on and the fact
that they hear what i have to say and
they're watching my game they're like i
want to be like you one day like what an
honor for me to be able to do what i
love and actually have a positive
influence on the kids in this community
you dream it you can be it and through
sport they can see you know what's a
possibility they can play professionally
one day they can play for canada one day
that's what's so special about soccer no
matter your background no matter your
status you know and put your cleats on
you grab a ball and you go play and it's
something that can just bond a community
bond a group of people over the joy and
love of soccer
